reviews.review_text: I almost lost it with disappointment and tears. When I first opened the box that was shipped my heart broke for like 0.2 secs because the front of the box that the headset came in had a picture of a black headset. Let alone I was already upset because little did I know that the same 2 controller covers that were side by side turned out to be 2 different controllers for two completely separate gaming systems.

reviews.title: RUNMUS K2 Gaming Headset
reviews.review_text: I ordered this product to replace an exact item for a birthday present later this month. I know he really likes the one he has so why change. Only drawback with the set he has is the fact that the soft ear covers deteriate over time and falls apart a little at a time.
it does not have batteries, it has a cord for the headset to function. otherwise it's a great headset. The headset is everything else that is advertised.

Works 100%. Definitely cancels out noise when playing a game. At first I thought they didn't work but it's 2 kinds of plug (a red and green one). If you read the instructions it lets you know how everything works for each gaming console or device.

The fit is amazing and the sound is perfect, my only problem with it is when I use my laptop the microphone doesn't work despite being plugged in. No clue if this is a problem PC users would have but it works perfectly on my phone so it may just be user error.

Nothing stands out as noteworthy in terms of anything to like. It's a gaming headset. I do have a major problem with it, though. As soon as we opened it and tried it out, the microphone didn't work. Without a functioning microphone it's useless because that was the whole point in getting a headset. I don't recommend this product.

reviews.title: Some electronic products suck
reviews.review_text: I have bought a computer and Apple. I watch the headphones after 23 weeks. Everything sucks not worth buying any electronics from anyone of these places and I have bought from different places. They are just suck. They're good the first week once a week and a half camp they start going bad laptop had less than a month already broken these headphones didn't even last an hour. I have no idea what's going on with Walmart but some of those products sucks.
The mic does not work, you have to take it out several times just to get the mic to pick up audio. I'd do 0 stars if I could. They suckkkkkk!!!! Run! Keep your coins!

reviews.title: I probably not order this again
reviews.review_text: Very disappointed with the audio quality, sound quality does not come through and the button for mute does not work at all. Very frustrating when I had a deadline to get a new headset for work, hate the multiple cord endings on this and I would rather just have one connection port

reviews.title: Don't waste you money, Just me being Honest
reviews.review_text: If you're a console user don't waste your money on these headphones, i should have Read the reviews before Buying them but I didn't, when I got them at first everything worked fine everyone heard me fine, now the second day the headphone Started not working so I had to take it out and stick it back in, not only that the wire is very long and that's a No no for me so if your looking for some Decent headphones these are not it.

reviews.title: Amazing back then, still amazing today.
reviews.review_text: I had this headset briefly in 2018 back when it was sold on Amazon before I swapped to a Corsair headset, and I was very surprised that they still make it. So, after that Corsair died, this was a no brainer replacement. And for such a cheap price, it's a legitimate bang for your buck for whatever sort of gaming stuff you want to do. While not a hardcore audiophile piece of equipment, this headset gets the job done in spades for a fraction of the price of more premium kits. Just be careful with the volume control, cause this thing can get very loud.

reviews.title: Definetly decent headphones
reviews.review_text: Got on sale, These headphones feel really solid/durable. When i first got them i was worried that i had blown the speakers because of accidently turning the volume up with the knob on the wire insead of down (make sure you dont do that, it is clearly labeled im just foolish lol) yeah, no. these things can go REALLY LOUD and they definetly help block out sound with the thick ear cushioning. normally over ear headphones hurt my earlobes but not this one! not really sure about microphone quality as of yet.

reviews.title: Amazing product
reviews.review_text: my mainly got it for the microphone but the headset in general is amazing it's very loud, which is nice because i like my music loud, it's noise canceling but fair warning other people will be able to hear the music or whatever you're listening to if it's at max volume lol, but i rate this product a 10/10. :)
It's cheap. The second day it was making static sounds and had issues connecting and staying connected to the video game controller.

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.review_text: Had it for a couple months and it's still working perfectly fine. No complaints and everyone can hear me perfectly fine. No issues whatsoever
Not even 3 months and they don't have sound. Can't play with them since they went out. Can't hear the other players and they can hear me one day it just stopped working
I just opened the package last night and tried to connect but it didn't work, the problem is my kid he threw the package in the trash, we tried to call to the costumer and nobody answered.

This wited headset was originally purchased for work and the USB cable did not work with my set up. I did find that the auxiliary plug does. I got a refund as this wasn't what was needed and the seller is very responsive.
Gift for daughter and she loves them. Uses them every time she plays her video games and has no issues.
mic isn't compatible with switch without adapters even though it is advertised as being so. not worth it for that console if you need it

reviews.title: Not compatible with PS5
reviews.review_text: Bought for my son to use with his new playstation 5 but they are not compatible. I guess that is what happens when you don&amp;#39;t game. Lol. So I went and bought a new pair. Never used them because they were not compatible.

It works great with my Xbox One. However, I have to pull the plug out of the controller just a hair in order for the headphones and mic to work. Overall I really like it and for the most part it works great!
no worries about battery life cuz they plug into your controller and they light up they are awesome I love them they're the best I totally would recommend them to everybody in the world
Overall great headset but I only got use it for like a month bc the cord started to break at the part that you put into the controller but overall great headset

reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE!
reviews.review_text: This headset is not at all worth the money. After a month the cord started to fray. After 2 months it no longer works. Also you can't use the lights unless you plug another cord into it then into the wall. Highly disappointed.

reviews.title: Defective garbage
reviews.review_text: I've ordered 2 of these. First one, the little volume controller that's attached to the wire, malfunctioned after a while, and if not kept in a certain position, the sound kills out on one side of the headphones or both. Second pair, same problem only a lot faster. I do not recommend these. I suggest finding a different, more reliable brand.

My headphones came delivered broken. Only one headphone works, the mic doesn't work unless the hold the cord a certain way. And they definitely seem used and abused. Highly DONT recommend these. I was so excited to get them and I was so disappointed when they showed up.

I really like it. good quality product at a good price

reviews.title: False Advertisement
reviews.review_text: Dear Wal mart %26 Runmus, take your false advertisement and fake reviews down. this headset does not work for next gen consoles. Will NOT work for PS5 and Xbox series S/X. Theirs no sound, the cord isnt long enough IF you want the LED light to be on. its like 3-5 inches long.

reviews.title: Spend your hard earned money elsewhere.
reviews.review_text: you ever buy budget headphones in the past for pc gaming and they were surprisingly really good? Well this aint that. These are crap. Sound quality is pathetic. I bought these for pc gaming and im embarrassed that these even exist. regular earbuds are better then this worthless junk. This is some grade A chinese knockoff bullhonkey.

reviews.title: Okay, but not the best.
reviews.review_text: I could hear really well out of them, but everyone else heard an echo. (I borrowed my partner's headset to test out the Echo and it didn't happen with theirs. I also changed the audio settings and stuff yet it still caused a really bad Echo). I have a habit of pushing one side of the headset off so I have an ear exposed, this headset is very very bulky and for the first few minutes it is comfortable but after that it starts to kind of hurt. If you wear the headsets normally they might end up working fine for you but if you like to have one ear exposed they definitely are too bulky for that. I ended up returning mine and getting a less bulkier headset for a few dollars more.

reviews.title: If I had the product to review
reviews.review_text: Never received the packages, instead of Walmart resolving the issues they flagged my page for fraud ! I've used my card the same card in my account and I never really have issues but the driver clearly didn't read the delivery instructions because I received all my other items in the past. Wish I had a review

reviews.title: Serves it's purpose
reviews.review_text: Decent headset for the money. Does cancel out noise pretty well. Sound quality is impressive. Only two cons would be that the headset is too heavy on my head. After wearing it for awhile, my neck will ache. Also, the mic is short and needs to be a little longer to get it closer to your face so people can hear you talking. The part that plugs into the controller gets a bit staticky at times so that can be annoying. Headset does what it's supposed to and is good in a pinch but I'll be researching a better headset soon.

reviews.title: Demolished box!!
reviews.review_text: Returning this product! Bought 2 sets for Christmas gifts and the boxes were completely destroyed and taped back together! I am not sure why they would even send these to anyone! The box it was shipped in was perfectly fine, so this was directly done from the company themselves!

reviews.title: It's a good headset, but unusable Xbox One/S
reviews.review_text: This headset is good but don't buy it if you have a Old Xbox One (Xbox One, Xbox One S) Because you need to buy a ADAPTER to use this so you're basically purchasing more stuff just to use a singular thing. If your still looking for a headset, I'm pretty sure there's more like this one in your local Walmart (or on this website)
